price: Jika mereka bertobat, mendirikan salat, dan menunaikan zakat, maka (mereka itu) adalah saudara-saudaramu seagama.  Dan Kami menjelaskan ayat-ayat itu bagi kaum yang mengetahui.
arabic: فَإِن تَابُواْ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tābū wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata waātawū al-zakata fa-ikh'wānukum fī al-dīni wanufaṣṣilu al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿlamūna
